actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO users (image, name, phoneno, email, location, about, role, status, password_hash)
VALUES
(
		'{{"exampleimage"}}',
    '{{inp_name.text}}',
    '{{inp_phone.text}}',
    '{{inp_email.text}}',
    '{{inp_location.text}}',
    '{{inp_about.text}}',
		'{{inp_role.selectedOptionValue}}',
		'{{"pending"}}',
		'{{passwordHasing.createHash(inp_password.text)}}'
)
